content.title: Introduce Youself!
content.description:
Whether our class is small or large, it is always nice to 'get to know' each other :) In your post to this first discussion board, please share the following:

1. Who you are (name, grade, school)

2. Something about yourself (appropriate! Something we'd like to learn about you.)

3. One (or more) of your favorites! (favorite color, food, activity, etc.)

*After clicking the link, click the button "Start a New Thread," then key in your discussion.   Then click the "Post" button.
